name: Rogue Turret
description:
Shoot the Tie Fighters while avoiding the X-Wings before the Tie Fighers advance to destroy you!

Your Turret has gone Rogue so it needs accurate mouse control :)

Advance towards the Death Star and maybe you will get a chance to destroy it!

May the WOBBLE BE WITH YOU!

Controls: MOUSE

(Click top right of in-game window to toggle full-screen mode)

Linux version works on some versions - so if you run into problems then revert to running Windows version on Wine.

Please rate:

https://itch.io/jam/1-bit-clicker-jam/rate/131590

Also Early Version on Android on Playstore :)
